For a long time, mental health has been an issue that has been avoided & misunderstood by the entire world. In a bid to raise the awareness & test people\'s knowledge, we request you to take our short survey.\nThank you!
->The WHO says that every 1 in 4 people has a mental issue. \n->This translates to around 450M people globally. \n->Millions do not seek help due to stigma and discrimination.

Common disorders include: 
->Depression 
->Most kinds of phobias 
->Schizophrenia 
->Bipolar disorder 
->Autism 
->Anxiety and panic 
->Post-traumatic stress
